outcome.title: Distance in the plane
outcome.description: I can use the Pythagorean Theorem to compute distances in the plane.

outcome.title: Circles and equations
outcome.description: I can write an equation for a circle with a given center and radius. Conversely, I can identify the center and radius from an equation which defines a circle.

outcome.title: Trigonometry and the unit circle
outcome.description: I can use the unit circle to compute values of trigonometric functions.

outcome.title: Trigonometry in right triangles
outcome.description: I can compute lengths of sides and measures of angles using trigonometry in right triangles.

outcome.title: Trigonometric Identities 1
outcome.description: I can manipulate and/or simplify expressions involving the "Pythagorean" and "angle-sum" trigonometric identities.

outcome.title: Trigonometric Identities 2
outcome.description: I can manipulate and simplify expressions involving the "double-angle" and "half-angle" (aka "power reduction") trigonometric identities.

outcome.title: Logarithm Rules
outcome.description: I can use "logarithm rules" to manipulate and simplify expressions involving logarithms.

outcome.title: Basic Graphs: sine and cosine
outcome.description: I can sketch basic graphs of the sine and cosine functions.

outcome.title: Basic Graphs: logarithms and exponentials
outcome.description: I can sketch basic graphs of exponential functions and logarithms.

outcome.title: Basic Graphs: tangent and arctangent
outcome.description: I can sketch basic graphs of the tangent and arctangent functions.

outcome.title: Analyzing transcendental functions
outcome.description: I can determine when a transcendental function is zero or undefined and make a sign chart.

outcome.title: Similar Triangles
outcome.description: I can use triangle similarity to compute lengths in the plane.

outcome.title: Synthesis 1.1
outcome.description: I can manipulate expressions and solve equations by successively performing multiple algebraic steps.
